programme.title: Sporting Heroes
programme.sub-title: Sporting Heroes: Gary Newbon Interviews Naseem Hamed.
programme.desc: An interview with the former boxer, who reigned supreme in the featherweight division in the latter half of the 1990s, but came unstuck when he faced Marco Antonio Barrera. Hamed first won the WBO title in 1995 when he dethroned Steve Robinson, and also went on to claim the IBF and WBC belts before suffering the sole loss of his career to Barrera in Las Vegas in 2001, and retired after one final bout against Manuel Calvo in 2002(n)

programme.title: Live - Wimbledon 2017
programme.desc: Coverage of day seven at the All England Club, where the men's and ladies' fourth-round singles matches are due to get under way. Andy Murray recorded a 7-5, 6-1, 6-4 victory over the mercurial Nick Kyrgios at the corresponding stage of last year's tournament, while Roger Federer defeated Steve Johnson in straight sets to also secure his passage to the next round. Meanwhile, Serena Williams made light work of number 13 seed Svetlana Kuznetsova, beating her 7-5, 6-0 to move into the quarter-finals(n)

programme.desc: Coverage of day eight at the All England Club, where the ladies' quarter-final singles matches are due to take place. All four of the last-eight matches at last year's tournament were settled in straight sets, and it was the unseeded Elena Vesnina who claimed the win of the round as she eliminated 18th seed Dominika Cibulkova. Meanwhile, there were also victories for Serena Williams, Angelique Kerber and Venus Williams, over Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova , Simona Halep and Yaroslava Shvedova respectively(n)

programme.title: Live - Wimbledon 2017
programme.desc: Coverage of day nine at the All England Club, where the mens' quarter-final singles matches are due to take place. Both Roger Federer and Andy Murray were involved in epic five-set encounters at this stage of last year's competition, with the Swiss being pushed all the way by Marin Cilic before eventually prevailing 6-7, 4-6, 6-3, 7-6, 6-3, while Murray registered a 7-6, 6-1, 3-6, 4-6, 6-1 win over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga. Meanwhile, there were also victories for Milos Raonic and Tomas Berdych over Sam Querrey and Lucas Pouille respectively(n)

Also: Gary Sanchez, Aaron Judge, Justin Bour, Mike Moustakas, Miguel Sano, Cody Bellinger and Charlie Blackmon. Stanton totaled a record 61 HRs last year, defeating 2015 champ Todd Frazier in the final match, 20-13(n)

programme.desc: Wimbledonska sveta trava je znova v ospredju zanimanja teniških ljubiteljev, saj je na sporedu tretji letošnji turnir za grand slam, ki velja hkrati tudi za najprestižnejšega v teniškem svetu. Pri dekletih je bila pred letom dni najboljša Serena Williams, ki zaradi nosečnosti ne bo branila zmage, zato je lov na sveti gral odprt, pri moških naslov brani domači matador Andy Murray. Pred nami je 14 dni zanimivih teniških bojev, ki jih spremljajte na programih Sportkluba(n)
